algebraic_word_problem: A printing press can print 2,000 pages per hour. A second press can print 50% faster. If both presses work together to print 50,000 pages, how long will it take?
step_by_step_solution: First press rate = 2000 pages/hour; Second press rate = 2000 * 1.5 = 3000 pages/hour; Total rate = 5000 pages/hour; Time = 50000 / 5000.
